Question: In his acceptance remarks, this person said, "Freedom is one thing.
Hints: Abernathy heard the shot from inside the motel room and ran to the balcony to find this person on the floor.
This person returned in July 1962, and was sentenced to forty-five days in jail or a $178 fine.
This person was second in Gallup's List of Most Widely Admired People of the 20th Century.
